articles.title: Jets GM Joe Douglas unlikely to pass on NC State OT Ikem Ekwonu at No. 4: sources - New York Daily News
articles.description: The buzz around the league is that Joe Douglas loves North Carolina State’s offensive tackle Ikem Ekwonu.
articles.content:
